columns.Storm_ID: The unique identifier for each storm.
columns.Name: The name or title of the storm.
columns.Dates_active: The date range during which the storm was active.
columns.Max_speed: The maximum wind speed recorded for the storm.
columns.Damage_millions_USD: The estimated damage caused by the storm in millions of USD.
columns.Number_Deaths: The total number of deaths attributed to the storm.

storm.table_description: The table records information about significant storms.

columns.Region_id: The unique identifier for each region.
columns.Region_code: The short code representing the region.
columns.Region_name: The full name of the region.

region.table_description: The table lists different regions and their identifiers.

columns.Region_id: The unique identifier for each region affected by the storm.
columns.Storm_ID: The unique identifier for each storm impacting the region.
columns.Number_city_affected: The total number of cities impacted by the storm.

affected_region.table_description: The table tracks regions affected by specific storms and their impacts.
